Code-Color-Cook
Hey! I am Alisha Mohanty. I am a developer at Accenture who is trying to get out of it. *Hoping no Accenture folks sees*. Major portion of my life I have been a nerdish introvert procastinating and building new situations and reliving moments. But now I dedicate most of my time trying new things. Thanks to Internet. Discovering new interests has become my recent passion. I go by the mantra, why not try everything? You are most likely to find me learn something or experimenting new dishes. Also, I now into digital art too so, please sponser me an ipad *if you can*. Sideby, I am also doing different projects, so feel free to hire me or colaborate on different ideas too *P.S Idea has to interesting*. Send me a message in any platforms. See you soon :)

Feel free to say Hi ! You are magnificient beyond measure, perfect in your own imperfections and wonderfully made.
